title: Stepstowealth
author: Stepstowealth
content: As a morally upright person that does not like to cheat people, but gambles and has lost a lot of money to gambling in a casino where you have sometimes been cheated even without your knowledge or betting on sports, will you take an opportunity you get and go against your moral standards to cheat a casino or sportsbetting place, just so you can win big at least even once. Will you try a trick to win on casino game machines if you were told and it is a 100% working trick to cash out? Will you bet on fixed games if you get the tip early?

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on June 22, 2023, 03:12:12 PMWill you try a trick to win on casino game machines if you were told and it is a 100% working trick to cash out? I was going to ask how you can cheat a casino but even with a trick on the machine, the probability is very limited for that to happen Quote from: Stepstowealth on June 22, 2023, 03:12:12 PMWill you bet on fixed games if you get the tip early? Is anything wrong with fixed games? I don't think so.If you as a bettor have a chance that a football match for example has been fixed, you can bet on the direction for winning your bet and that is not you cheating. In this case you didn't cheat but those who fixed the game did.

comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Maybe you have to be honest and not a hypocrite if you have this scenario, if so the situation I suffered a continuous loss and did not have a win, maybe if I find a trick to play cheating, on average people will take it, who is not interested in getting a consistent profit Even though it's playing cheating.Moreover, those who are in fact want to get money easily/ the gambling addicts who want to take money will definitely continue to do it.But for people who are moral, I will also take advantage of this situation, but with an agreement that the casino will give a prize when I report that the platform can be cursed with certain tricks, if indeed they agree to pay, it is better I report it to Casino. But until now I have not found any in any casino as far as I play in many casinos have 100% tricks that can take advantage.Has anyone ever found it?

Nope, I will not cheat besides how can someone can say that it is 100% working I can be assured that what he is saying is true when he is one of the employee but then it is unlikely to happen. comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on June 22, 2023, 03:12:12 PMWill you try a trick to win on casino game machines if you were told and it is a 100% working trick to cash out? Will you bet on fixed games if you get the tip early? Only what I can tell you is to be very careful of anyone that is telling you that you can cheat a gambling site, be it casino or sport betting. There are some people that can be decoyed to pay and are scammed, given what would be used to do the cheat a casino or sport betting site and they lose again. They are scammed and they lose money to the gambling site. Two losses at once.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: The easy answer is yes, as it's tempting to cheat to win a decent sum of money after losing so many times and so much money to that same company you are going to cheat. However, any rewards coming from cheating doesn't bear fruits in someone's life. You can observe examples around you, involving people you know or famous people and you will see when they deceived others to achieve their goals, it will look like those goals have actually brought more trouble than plenitude to them. So I guess you don't want this for your life, so just don't cheat.Follow the righteousness path, even when things look unfavourable to you and good opportunities will appear for you later, in a legit way. This recipe can't guarantee you will reach the top of the world, but it will guarantee you live in peace, with integrity, having everything you need to survive dignifiedly.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: I want to ask how to cheat in gambling or is there a trick that can work against their casino machines, whereas casinos always have a system to detect the cheating that we do?If you want to win big at a sports betting casino, you can do it without cheating. You just have to bet big and choose a team that has the potential to win. Isn't it that sports betting can be analyzed in a team?Why do you have to do cheating when no one can do this, even if we lose big, we must be ready to accept responsibility, so in any football bet you can win a large amount if you are right in the bet, for example in a multi bet, the odds will be large enough

comments.author: Cantsay

Will you bet on fixed games if you get the tip early? Everyone thinks they are saints until they are faced with situations where it's almost impossible to resist the offer.Bet on fixed games? There is a low probability of me betting on it, but that's only if it comes to me freely because I'll never go out to search for tips from a scammer to win a bet, it's now obvious that most of those that claime to have info about a game do not have anything they are only waiting for you to take the bait so that they can scam you.And as for other cheats like; creating multiple acccounts, going against the ToS of the casino so that I can make more money, Nah!!! I ain't gonna do that because not only do I go against the laid down rule I also risk my account getting blocked along with my funds.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: If you have that kind of trick to win, you better not spit it out or casinos will be checking who else has found that trick. I'm sure morals can be bent until proven to be a cheat but if it's a strategy it's possibly gonna be pushed by a gambler as a strategy than a cheat. Until it's not proven to be a cheat, then the conscience is clean. I have tried different tricks already somehow I find it not worth it in the end, one cheat to exploit isn't so bad lol. Now spit it out!

comments.author: borovichok
comments.body: Quote from: ajiz138 on June 22, 2023, 03:45:47 PMI want to ask how to cheat in gambling or is there a trick that can work against their casino machines, whereas casinos always have a system to detect the cheating that we do?If you want to win big at a sports betting casino, you can do it without cheating. You just have to bet big and choose a team that has the potential to win. Isn't it that sports betting can be analyzed in a team?Why do you have to do cheating when no one can do this, even if we lose big, we must be ready to accept responsibility, so in any football bet you can win a large amount if you are right in the bet, for example in a multi bet, the odds will be large enoughA gambling trick is impossible because one cannot control the scores of a game or even predict the likely outcome of a casino. We gamble every day and lose; we signed up for this and accept full responsibility for our actions, which will result in profits or losses. OP meant no offense; he was simply expressing his perspective that if we were given the opportunity to cheat and go subsequently to our guiding principles, I would gladly do so. I'm willing to do whatever in the gambling system to make things go my way, it's strictly making important decisions that will either make our lives better or worse.

Now spit it out!Many gamblers have been doing tricks and strategies for them to win but that doesn't mean that they are cheating unless the casino itself would see it as an illegal activity. For a gambler who has been experiencing losing streaks, I'm sure that it will be easier for him to decide whether to cheat or not especially if it will help him recover from his losses.It will be a risk because we might be penalized for our actions if it's against the casino's TOS which may affect our account or even our future transactions that might also put our funds on hold. If we'll do such a thing, we have to make sure that we are also ready to face the possible consequences because for sure, once the casino notices that they're being abused, they will also take action to penalize proven cheaters.

comments.author: Aikidoka
comments.body: Is the system not solid enough in the casino to prevent people from cheating? I think it's pretty difficult to cheat in a casino and make a big profit. While I think there may be some tricks one could try but most areas in a real-life casino are monitored by cameras. So even if you were to try cheating or engaging in suspicious activities you'll be caught imoSpeaking of cheating in a casino, this reminds me of an anime called Kaiji, specifically in season 2. In that season, the main character actually managed to cheat a slot machine and make a lot of money after being in debt for a long time. It was quite an interesting gambling anime. Quote from: Stepstowealth on June 22, 2023, 03:12:12 PMWill you try a trick to win on casino game machines if you were told and it is a 100% working trick to cash out? To be honest, I won't take that risk and cheating is not something I would ever consider even in a casino. I prefer to play fair and patiently wait for my luck to come.Quote from: Stepstowealth on June 22, 2023, 03:12:12 PMWill you bet on fixed games if you get the tip early? I think it's acceptable to buy a fixed game and place bets on it early. It might be considered cheating in certain points but at least you are paying for a service. Personally, I don't view it as cheating but I would never engage in manipulating slot machines or using tricks in a casino.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: Stepstowealth on June 22, 2023, 03:12:12 PMAs a morally upright person that does not like to cheat people, but gambles and has lost a lot of money to gambling in a casino where you have sometimes been cheated even without your knowledge or betting on sports, will you take an opportunity you get and go against your moral standards to cheat a casino or sportsbetting place, just so you can win big at least even once. Will you try a trick to win on casino game machines if you were told and it is a 100% working trick to cash out? Will you bet on fixed games if you get the tip early? It is easy to talk about the hypothetical scenario of cheating in a casino, but everything is completely different when such an opportunity to outsmart the casino and take possession of a large amount of winnings appears in reality. I didn't have such a dilemma and I don't want to fantasize about what I would do. To be honest, I don’t know exactly how I would have acted: I deceived the casino for a big jackpot or not.Each of us who write in this section has ever lost money in a casino and I believe that almost everyone believes that this was unfair on the part of the casino. Everyone understands perfectly how casinos work and how they pull money from their users. My point is that every gambler believes deep down that his past losses were unfair and therefore entitled to revenge. This means that he has the full moral right to return his money, even with the help of a dubious method using cheating in a casino. Do any of you think the same?Personally, I don’t have a problem with gambling (I don’t gamble at all), which means that even with access to information about the possibility of cheating in a casino, I would not do it. More likely.
